title: Has anyone verified that the dust being raised by the demolition of the Red Cross Police Station is safe ie. no asbestos?
text:
All projects of this nature are reviewed, and like any other
demolition, if asbestos is found, the proper safety precautions
legally must be followed. That said, I'm assigning a reporter to look
into it. If there's anything to report, we'll do so on
StarNewsOnline.com. Thanks for raising this possible news tips.
